ogTitle: quote of the day: president calvin coolidge
ogDescription: a athe heart of america is with those who made the great sacrifice in defense of our ideals.a

card_1.cardText:
> _A aThe heart of America is with those who made the great sacrifice in defense of our ideals.a_

President Coolidge

card_10.cardText:
Pres. Coolidge said this during a special Christmas Eve message to the nationas veterans in 1923, before walking out to light the first National Christmas Tree. On Christmas Day, Pres. Coolidge & his family spent 3 hrs with veterans of WWI at Walter Reed Hospital.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-11-28-qtd/)
